data.text: @lucyallan @UKLabour @SadiqKhan @TfL Remember there’s more important issues going on in the world right now!  Wrong time FGS

@lucyallan @UKLabour @SadiqKhan @TfL I don’t usually agree with you. But yes The current mayor and the labour councillors are completely out of touch of the reality on the roads. Their approach to congestion is to close roads, create single lanes for traffic create LTN’s in the worst places. It’s a shambles
@lucyallan @UKLabour @SadiqKhan @TfL Are you blind or corrupt? 2018 - tories cut TFL funding after Khan reduced Boris’ deficit. New York and Paris metro systems receive public funding.
@lucyallan @UKLabour @SadiqKhan @TfL It's the govt who are withholding vital funding.....
@deanobluenose @lucyallan @scouts_uk @UKLabour @SadiqKhan @TfL Mr Pifle reduced the funding oops sorry about the typo
@JoMichaels17 @lucyallan @UKLabour @SadiqKhan @TfL No please don’t! 9 years of being an MP and what has she achieved!

@lucyallan @UKLabour @SadiqKhan @TfL Well Lucy, yet another tweet you've sent that doesn't get the response you wanted...its not going to impress  Johnson is it..Please stay in London, we don't want or need you in Telford.
